title: INFINITESKILLS INTRODUCTION TO HADOOP YARN TRAINING VIDEO TUTORI
description:
NTRODUCTION TO HADOOP YARN [ENGLISH]

In this Introduction to Hadoop YARN training course, expert
author David Yahalom will teach you everything you need to
know about YARN. This course is designed for the absolute
beginner, meaning no experience with YARN is required
You will start by learning about the core Hadoop
components, including map/reduce. From there, David will
teach you about the YARN components and architecture
Finally, this video tutorial will cover scheduling
running, and monitoring applications in YARN, including
running jobs in YARN, failure handling, YARN logs, and YARN
cluster resource allocation
Once you have completed this computer based training
course, you will have learned everything you need to know
to get started with YARN
